content.comment:
Post rating calculation is performed and post updated with new average score.
Event notification is sent to post owner:
From: event notification code (no reply)
To: post owner
'** Re: <post title> **
Congratulations! Someone rated your post.  To check your inbox
Send: '#post menu'  to <service code>
Do not reply to this message.

content.description: Send your post rating from 1 to 5.  1 is Poor, 5 is Excellent
